import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import {listProductDetails} from '../actions/productActions' const ProductScreen = () => { const match = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductDetails(match.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) const product = {} return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: {product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 3 ? 'In Stock' : product.countInStock <= 3 && product.countInStock > 0 ? 'Limited Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
